attributes.action: Save the Farmer Andy on 97.4 Cool FM Pete Snodden Breakfast Show
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fellow Cool FM Breakfast show listeners, we must club together to save our beloved Farmer Andy from the evil wrath of the one they call Snodden. We must not let him become another victim of bad choices on Breakfast Radio Shows!

rejection.details: Petitions to the Number 10 site should request an action that can be taken by the Prime Minister or Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
